https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aHn4Ed0Q6w7uK1h6z5OJAFq8w49.jpg Mr. Arturo, an old rich Spanishman who arrives to Havana to marry Yoli, dies suddenly in bed. Yoli's family, afraid of losing all the money, convinces her ex-boyfriend Papito to go to Spain and get the money. Papito will have to be clever enough to deceive everybody and succeed in Spain A King in Havana
